mapper.insert: INSERT into licence_manage_use (id, title, odd_number, state, process_instance_id, remark, enclosure_info, create_id, create_time) VALUES(#{id}, #{title}, #{oddNumber}, #{state}, #{processInstanceId}, #{remark}, #{enclosureInfo}, #{createId}, #{createTime})

insert into licence_manage_use_goods (id, use_id, licence_manage_id, licence_manage_name, remark, state) values
(#{item.id}, #{item.useId}, #{item.licenceId}, #{item.licenceName}, #{item.remark}, #{item.state})
mapper.select: SELECT a.id, a.state, a.create_id createId FROM licence_manage_use a WHERE a.process_instance_id = #{processInstanceId}

SELECT a.id, a.title, a.odd_number oddNumber, a.remark, a.state, b.user_name userName, IFNULL(a.enclosure_info, '') enclosureInfo, IFNULL(a.process_instance_id, '') processInstanceId FROM licence_manage_use a LEFT JOIN sys_eve_user_staff b ON a.create_id = b.user_id WHERE a.id = #{id}
SELECT a.create_id createName FROM licence_manage_use a WHERE a.id = #{useId}

SELECT a.id, a.title, a.odd_number oddNumber, a.remark, b.user_name userName, IFNULL(a.enclosure_info, '') enclosureInfo, a.process_instance_id processInstanceId, a.state FROM licence_manage_use a LEFT JOIN sys_eve_user_staff b ON a.create_id = b.user_id WHERE a.id = #{id}

SELECT a.id, a.licence_manage_id licenceId, a.licence_manage_name licenceName, a.remark, a.state, CASE a.state WHEN '0' THEN '未提交审批' WHEN '1' THEN '等待发放' WHEN '2' THEN '库存不足' WHEN '3' THEN '库存充足' WHEN '4' THEN '拒绝发放' END stateName FROM licence_manage_use_goods a WHERE a.use_id = #{useId}
SELECT a.licence_manage_id licenceId, a.remark FROM licence_manage_use_goods a WHERE a.use_id = #{id}
